question:
Sharqi dynasty was founded by which of the following kings?
1) Malik Sarwar
2) Mubarak Shah
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Feroz Shah Tughlaq appointed Malik Sarwar the governor of the Jaunpur region in 1388. To put an end to the unrest in the Sultanate, Malik Sarwar and his adopted son, Mubarak Shah, founded the Sharqi dynasty.
